attributes.action: Keep grassroots football going throughout November / December 2020 Lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
It is well known that outdoor transmission of the Covid 19 is minimal. All grassroots clubs have guidelines & processes in place to make football safe. 
This petition is to fight to keep grassroots football going throughout the new restrictions. Benefits: 
- Physical health maintained or increased during restrictions 
- Mental health maintained or increased due to the social aspect of sport. 
- Improves parents mental health. Taking/ watching your child will support adult mental health.
attributes.background:
To allow Grassroots Football to continue throughout Lockdown, current and future.

To support the FA with facilitating the continuation of football at a grassroots level where local non elite leagues have already a sufficient risk assessment in place.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:
